items.name: Component_WobbleAnimation
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_WobbleAnimation
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_WobbleAnimation extends gs.Component_Animation
    ###*
    * Executes a blur-animation on a game-object.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Component_WobbleAnimation
    * @extends gs.Component_Animation
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: (data) ->
        super
        
        ###*
        * The easing-object used for the animation.
        * @property easing
        * @type gs.Easing
        ###
        @powerEasing = new gs.Easing(null, data?.powerEasing)
        @speedEasing = new gs.Easing(null, data?.speedEasing)
        
    ###*
    * Updates the blend-animation.
    *
    * @method update
    ###   
    update: ->
        super
        if !@powerEasing.isRunning and !@speedEasing.isRunning then return

        @powerEasing.updateValue()
        @speedEasing.updateValue()
        @object.effects.wobble.power = @powerEasing.value
        @object.effects.wobble.speed = @speedEasing.value
        
        if !@powerEasing.isRunning and !@speedEasing.isRunning
            @callback?(@object, this)
 
    ###*
    * Starts the blend-animation.
    *
    * @method start
    * @param {number} power The target power.
    * @param {number} duration The duration in frames.
    * @param {Object} easingType The easing-type.
    * @param {function} [callback] An optional callback called if the animation is finished. 
    ###  
    start: (power, speed, duration, easingType, callback) ->
        @callback = callback
        @powerEasing.type = easingType || gs.Easings.EASE_LINEAR[gs.EasingTypes.EASE_IN]
        @speedEasing.type = easingType || gs.Easings.EASE_LINEAR[gs.EasingTypes.EASE_IN]
        if @object.effects.wobble.power == power or @object.effects.wobble.speed == speed then return @callback?(@object, this)
        
        if duration == 0 or @isInstantSkip()
            @object.effects.wobble.power = power
            @object.effects.wobble.speed = speed
            @callback?(@object, this)
        else
            @powerEasing.startValue(@object.effects.wobble.power, power - @object.effects.wobble.power, duration)
            @speedEasing.startValue(@object.effects.wobble.speed, speed - @object.effects.wobble.speed, duration)
        
gs.Component_WobbleAnimation = Component_WobbleAnimation
